casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Randall Scott CARMICHAEL. No. 672P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Randall Scott Carmichael, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 23rd day of December 2003 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Brunswick County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
